img_summary: The image depicts the "Gall Gem," an uncommon item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is used to moderately increase Poison Resistance for a short duration when consumed via the Gourd. The item is obtained by defeating the enemy harassing the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove, near the Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain.
